Title: 14.1 Built-In Function and Operator Reference
14.8 String Functions and Operators
Description:
ELT() returns the
          Nth element of the list of strings:
          str1 if
          N = 1,
          str2 if
          N = 2, and so
          on. Returns NULL if
          N is less than
          1, greater than the number of arguments, or
          NULL. ELT()
          is the complement of FIELD().
